name: Idle Universe!
description:
Do you know the planets of our solar system?

Have you ever wondered how the solar system works?

In IDLE UNIVERSE, you will create planet from a meteorite. Sun, Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, you will have the entire solar system.

Explore the universe and understand the mysteries of black holes.

Other galaxies, more planets, are waiting for your discovery.
